aom.scripting.xs.kb

Class Army

  • Object
    • Army

  • public class Army
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of KB commands concerning Armies. An army is a logical grouping of units. Units can only be part of 1 army and an army can only consist of 30 unit max.
    Author:
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

      Adds the unitID to the given army.

      Creates a army with the given name.

      Destroys the given army.
